long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview

The Auto Refresh Chrome extension provides a simple and efficient way to automatically refresh web pages at user-defined intervals. Perfect for monitoring live updates, stock prices, or any content that frequently changes, this tool allows users to set a numeric time interval for automatic page refreshes, ensuring that the latest information is always at their fingertips.

Key user-friendly features include:

Custom Refresh Intervals: Easily set a specific time interval in seconds, minutes, or hours, allowing the page to refresh automatically based on your chosen timing.

Dynamic Interval Adjustment: Change the refresh interval at any time without interrupting the ongoing cycle, providing flexibility and control over the refresh frequency.

Continuous Refresh Cycles: The extension keeps refreshing the page at the set interval until the user stops it, making it ideal for tasks that require ongoing monitoring.

Intuitive Control Panel: The user-friendly popup interface allows for quick setup and adjustments, ensuring a hassle-free experience with minimal clicks.

Pause and Resume Functionality: Start, pause, and resume refresh cycles effortlessly, giving users complete control over when the page updates.

With its straightforward design and customizable settings, the Auto Refresh extension is a convenient solution for users who need to keep their web content updated automatically, enhancing productivity and efficiency without the need for constant manual refreshing.
